author: felicity
msg: bug 2155: make learn-to-journal a restricted command.  also move some
of the other options around to make the flow better in the documentation.

author: felicity
msg: 1) sa-learn called init, which called init_learner with the config options.
for me, this enabled learn to journal.	cmdlearn then called init_learner with
the appropriate options for forget (don't learn to journal), except that
init_learner only can enable, not disable options.  so we always learned to the
2) during a forget (which can be called when we're learning an already learned
message as a different type as well), we didn't update the journal.
3) auto_learn_journal is a minomer since all learning goes to the journal.
so: we now allow init_learner to enable or disable options depending
on true/false values, we rename auto_learn_to_journal to just be
learn_to_journal, and forget now will update the journal if necessary.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2151: perl 5.005 didn't like the $foo(@_) type specification to run
